items.description: An object contains general info about the graph
items.title: General Grap Info

___ArcsCount.description: The total number of arcs in the graph
___ArcsCount.title: Number of Arcs

___NodesCount.description: The total number of nodes in the graph
___NodesCount.title: Number of Nodes

items.description: All nodes are enumerated in this object
items.title: Nodes Info

___Nodes.description: The nodes of the graph are given within this array
___Nodes.title: List of Nodes

items.description: All arcs are enumerated in this object
items.title: Arcs Info

___Arcs.description: The arcs of the graph are given within this array
___Arcs.title: List of Arcs

items.description: A description of an arc of this graph
items.title: Graph Arc

___S.description: The source node of this arc given as an index in 'Nodes' array
___S.title: Source Node

___D.description: The destination node of this arc given as an index in 'Nodes' array
___D.title: Destination Node

items.description: All info that is related to graph visualisation is given here, such as vertices positions or level in concept lattices
items.title: Visualisation Info

___Tops.description: A set of vectices having no input arcs. Vectices are given by the indexes in the THIS[1].Nodes array
___Tops.title: Output Vertices

___Bottoms.description: A set of vectices having no output arcs. Vectices are given by the indexes in the THIS[1].Nodes array
___Bottoms.title: Input Vertices
